trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when a sequence of log records is full.
trans-unit.target: 表示記錄檔記錄順序已滿時就會擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Log.SequenceFullException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IO.Log.SequenceFullException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Log.SequenceFullException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IO.Log.SequenceFullException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Log.SequenceFullException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IO.Log.SequenceFullException"></xref>使用序列化資料的類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>其中保存有關擲回例外狀況的序列化的物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>其中包含關於來源或目的端內容資訊。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Log.SequenceFullException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IO.Log.SequenceFullException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況。
